## 254. HAIR (MASS)
### Definition
Collective or plural noun, applicable to head hair of human. Should be strictly separated from words that specifically designate ‘a single hair’, ‘body hair (fur)’ or ‘facial hair’. Also to be distinguished from numerous specific kinds of hair (‘long hair’, ‘blonde hair’, ‘curly hair’, various types of coiffures etc.). (GLD)

### Contexts
1. He pulled him by his hair. 2. My hair grows better than his. 3. Hair grow on the head, moustache and beard grow on the face.
